dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine widely takes root in all branches of modern medicine including traumatology and orthopedics The main goal of this work was to present our experience with asynchronic teleconsultation in daily clinical practice in particular in the treatment of polytrauma patients
Ulusal travma ve acil cerrahi dergisi = Turkish journal of trauma And emergency surgery : TJTES
Our experience with telemedicine in traumatology and orthopedics.
